title: how to learn CSS
content: As with so many technologies, Node.js has its champions and its detractors. But there’s no denying that it is widely used by some powerhouse websites, including Uber, LinkedIn, and PayPal—which makes it a powerhouse no matter which side of the debate you’re on. And popular technologies used by big brands are always something to pay attention to when youre making career choices.
author: arif ch
metahead: learn node in one video. i am going to learn node in one video and bcome a computer software developer Let’s consider how this works in action: let’s say your friend sends you a link to a funny video. When you click on the link, your web browser (the client) sends a request to the video website (the server) asking for the video file. The website’s server receives the request and sends the file to your computer.
